docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Quick Quiz (Session 2)
docs.text:
1) What is WMS? A. A service that returns vector features and attributes B. A service that returns map images (rendered) C. A file format like SHP

Answer ✅ **B** — WMS returns rendered **images** of maps. You can view them, but you don’t get feature geometry/attributes. Show explanation ✅ Correct: WFS gives you features + attributes that you can query.
